resources.string: This is not your username or pin. This name will be visible to your WhatsApp contacts.
Hey, hope you are having fun learning Android. This app contains a series of layout which you might be using on a daily basis but wondered how are they made.
Please click on Next to continue

Hope you are having fun learning Android with us. You have seen few previous layouts of the apps which we use in our daily lives. We hope you tried to create them yourself. If not then, no need to worry this subject is a very vast and every day you learn new things. Since there are a lot of things it is expected from you that you make efforts to search the internet about the new things you might have seen in these practice problems.
